title: Agile-1 Takes First Place in HRO Today's Baker's Dozen for Mid-Tier/Specialty Market RPO Providers
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/22/2015 @ 3:13 PM   Agile-1 
TORRANCE, Calif., Sept. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Agile-1 , a global workforce management solutions company, is proud to announce that its recruitment process outsourcing (RPO) division has taken first place in HRO Today's 2015 Baker's Dozen in the category of Mid-Tier/Specialty Market providers. The rankings are not based on the opinions of HRO Today, but solely on the feedback from customers, collected via online surveys. HRO Today utilizes a mathematical algorithm to weigh questions and then analyzes results across three subcategories: service breadth, deal size and quality of service. Rankings are based on these scores as well as an overall score. 
"Agile-1has been in the industry for several years, providing RPO services to a number of leading companies," said Mr. Elliot Clark, CEO and Chairman of SharedXpertise, the publishing company of HRO Today. "We are happy that Agile-1 chose to participate in the 2015 survey, and as a result, has affirmed their position in the market for client satisfaction." 
"We are thrilled to have taken the top position on the Baker's Dozen list, as this is our first time to participate in the rankings," said Mr. Peter Carvalho, President of Agile-1. "Our RPO division has achieved significant growth over the past several years under the leadership and direction of Mrs. Tracey Friend Richardson, Vice President RPO Practice. She and her team have won the confidence of our clients by going beyond transactional support of their businesses. As talent advisors, Mrs. Richardson's team is dedicated to providing strategic guidance to their clients to help them achieve the objectives that impact the bottom line. We truly value the close partnerships we have formed with our clients and appreciate the positive feedback they provided during the online survey process." 
In the post-recession labor market, the forces of supply and demand have shifted such that companies are now engaged in fierce competition for skilled labor. Taking first place on the Baker's Dozen list validates that Agile-1 is a trusted recruitment outsourcing partner with the expertise to help clients optimize their talent acquisition strategies. By providing employment marketing programs, data analytics dashboards, and innovative technology solutions, Agile-1 helps clients achieve greater transparency, agility, and brand recognition. 
About Agile-1 Agile-1 RPO is a trusted recruitment outsourcing partner with expertise in the practice areas of: manufacturing, healthcare, retail, energy, and contact centers. Our scalable solutions deliver the processes, data, technology, and resources to effectively augment, compliment, or transform the way companies hire talent. Workforce challenges. Solved.
